abstract: Bank of America plans to set up a wholly owned subsidiary in China to expand in the world’s fastest-growing major economy, people briefed on the plan told Reuters.
snippet: Bank of America plans to set up a wholly owned subsidiary in China to expand in the world’s fastest-growing major economy, people briefed on the plan told Reuters.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America plans to set up a wholly owned subsidiary in China to expand in the world’s fastest-growing major economy, people briefed on the plan told Reuters.

headline.main: Bank of America Said to Plan Expansion in China
